sqlMap.select: select DOWN_ID, DOWN_DESC, DOWN_PROGRESS, DOWN_FILE_PATH, IS_DOWN from T01_SYS_DOWN_LOG where rownum < 21 and user_id = '$userId$' and to_char(start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and DOWN_ID in ($idParam$)
sqlMap.update: update t01_sys_down_log set is_down = '1' where down_id = '$downId$'
update T01_SYS_DOWN_LOG set DOWN_PROGRESS = '$progress$' where down_id = '$downId$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T01_SYS_DOWN_LOG (down_id, down_desc, file_rownum, DOWN_FILE_PATH, user_id, user_name, start_date) values ('$downId$','$fileName$' ,'$rowNum$', '$downFilePath$','$userId$', '$userName$', sysdate)
